message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has significant value, potentially even exceeding $1500000.  While I can't disclose the exact details without a confidentiality agreement, I'm confident this product can be a game-changer for the right buyer.  I'm willing to offer it to you at a price of $2000000.  This represents a substantial discount from its true potential value.  Let me know if you're interested in exploring this further.
